alert.note: Alert for Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:11AM CDT until April 01 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Warren County in west central Mississippi... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 111 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bakers, or 9 miles east of Mangham, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bakers around 120 AM CDT. Tendal and Waverly around 130 AM CDT. Tallulah around 145 AM CDT. Mansford and Omega around 150 AM CDT. Eagle Bend around 200 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mound and Richmond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
